cee_meth_1.Description: 1. I did not recall any personal memories due to viewing these photos

cee_meth_10.Description: 10. I didn't like seeing the photos

cee_meth_11.Description: 11. I kept up the internal dialogue about the photos with myself even after they had ended

cee_meth_12.Description: 12. I was intensely aware of sensations with my gut, my heart beat or skin

cee_meth_13.Description: 13. I recalled of many personal memories (good or bad) due to viewing these photos

cee_meth_14.Description: 14. I was overwhelmed with the photos

cee_meth_15.Description: 15. I felt my heart beating faster (or slower) when viewing the photos

cee_meth_16.Description: 16. At one point, I didn't want to see any more of the photos

cee_meth_17.Description: 17. I tried hard to control my feelings and cravings when I saw the photos and I was successful

cee_meth_19.Description: 19. My mind did not closely attach to the photos

cee_meth_21.Description: 21. The photos were constantly repeating in my mind after viewing them

cee_meth_22.Description: 22. I had an "inner-talk" in my head about the photos

cee_meth_23.Description: 23. I was very disturbed seeing the photos

cee_meth_24.Description: 24.  I have many very positive memories associated with photos that were shown in the drug photos

cee_meth_25.Description: 25. I recalled bad memories when I saw the photos

cee_meth_26.Description: 26. I had a very bad feeling when viewing the photos

cee_meth_27.Description: 27. I had a feeling of mastery over my thoughts and feelings when I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_28.Description: 28. The photos grabbed my attention very strongly

cee_meth_29.Description: 29. I had a specific sensation in my limbs when I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_3.Description: 3. I felt as if I was really using drugs

cee_meth_30.Description: 30. I recalled pleasant memories when I saw the photos

cee_meth_31.Description: 31. I was not in control of my emotions and impulses when I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_32.Description: 32. I was able to see how these photos can change my feelings and thoughts

cee_meth_33.Description: 33. I felt depressed when I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_34.Description: 34. I was aware of how those photos were affecting my brain processes

cee_meth_35.Description: 35. I did not exert any mental effort to reframe my first impression and change my brain's response to the photos

cee_meth_36.Description: 36. I was becoming willing to consider doing almost anything to use methamphetamine

cee_meth_37.Description: 37. I had a desire to talk about my experience of seeing the photos

cee_meth_38.Description: 38. I reminded myself about the negative consequences of using drugs again when I was seeing the photos in order to change my response to the photos

cee_meth_39.Description: 39. I used my mental skills to change my brain's view to the photos and thereby change my internal response

cee_meth_4.Description: 4. I believed that if I talked about my feelings about the photos I would be able to control my feelings about them

cee_meth_40.Description: 40. I wished you would stop showing the photos to me

cee_meth_41.Description: 41. I thought using drugs would be fun again

cee_meth_42.Description: 42. I was able to remind myself about the positive benefits of abstinence in order to change my response to the photos

cee_meth_43.Description: 43. I was talking to myself about the photos while I was seeing them

cee_meth_44.Description: 44. It is very hard for me to explain with words what I was feeling while seeing the drug photos

cee_meth_45.Description: 45. I was experiencing an intense craving (almost uncontrollable desire) to use drugs

cee_meth_46.Description: 46. I took joy in seeing the photos

cee_meth_47.Description: 47. I was completely numb. I was unable to feel my body

cee_meth_48.Description: 48. I was in touch with a gut response when viewing the photos

cee_meth_49.Description: 49. I was fully in control of my emotions and impulses while I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_5.Description: 5. I had specific feelings and thoughts when I was viewing the photos but I had no idea how these feelings or thoughts were generated

cee_meth_50.Description: 50. I did not have any inner-talk with myself while I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_51.Description: 51. I wanted to avoid seeing the photos when you were showing them to me

cee_meth_52.Description: 52. I understood how drug cues like these photos can impact my thoughts and feelings

cee_meth_53.Description: 53. I tried to control my feelings and thoughts when I was seeing the photos but I could not

cee_meth_54.Description: 54. I wanted to run away from the photos

cee_meth_55.Description: 55. I needed to summon the energy to control my thoughts and feelings during seeing the photos and I was successful

cee_meth_56.Description: 56. I tried hard to control my feelings and cravings when I saw the photos and I was <u>not</u> successful

cee_meth_57.Description: 57. Seeing the photos made me feel good

cee_meth_59.Description: 59. These photos reminded me of many bad memories

cee_meth_6.Description: 6. Many words came to mind to describe my feelings when I was seeing photos

cee_meth_60.Description: 60. I was fearful while seeing the photos

cee_meth_61.Description: 61. I was talking with myself about how I would be affected if I started using drugs again in order to change my response to the photos

cee_meth_62.Description: 62. While seeing the photos, I felt that my mind was constantly chattering about them

cee_meth_63.Description: 63. I was confident that I was well in control of my thoughts and feelings while I was seeing these photos

cee_meth_64.Description: 64. I was very much engaged with the photos

cee_meth_65.Description: 65. I was very interested in using drugs

cee_meth_66.Description: 66. I could see how these photos might change my behavior

cee_meth_67.Description: 67. I couldn't think about anything else, when I was watching the photos

cee_meth_68.Description: 68. I was unable to control my thoughts and emotions when I was seeing the photos

cee_meth_7.Description: 7. Words were not easily accessible for me to describe my feelings while I was exposed to the photos

cee_meth_8.Description: 8. I associated really bad memories with scenes I was seeing in the drug photos

cee_meth_9.Description: 9. These photos brought-back many good memories for me

gen_memory_score.Description: E. GENERAL MEMORY RESPONSE (Good or Bad) SCORE:

metacog_score.Description: O. METACOGNITIVE RESPONSE (Awareness to the Importance of Cue Reactivity to Relapse) SCORE:

neg_appetitive_score.Description: C. NEGATIVE APPETITIVE RESPONSE (Avoidance, Aversion, Hating, Running away) SCORE:

neg_emotional_score.Description: D. NEGATIVE EMOTIONAL RESPONSE (Disgusted, Fearful, Anxious, Depressed, Guilty, Withdrawal) SCORE:

neg_memory_score.Description: G. NEGATIVE MEMORY RESPONSE (Bad memories retrieval, like....) SCORE:

pos_appetitive_score.Description: A. POSITIVE APPETITIVE (Wanting, Liking, Craving, Urging) SCORE:

pos_emotional_score.Description: B. POSITIVE EMOTIONAL (Happiness, Calmness, Satiated, Elated, Pleasured, Intoxicated) SCORE:

pos_memory_score.Description: F. POSITIVE MEMORY RESPONSE (Good memories retrieval, like....) SCORE:

success_control_score.Description: K. SUCCESSFUL EFFORTFUL CONTROLLING RESPONSE (Being In-control) SCORE:

unsuccess_control_score.Description: J. UNSUCCESSFUL EFFORTFUL CONTROLLING RESPONSE (Being Overwhelmed) SCORE:
